name: Dungeon of Robots
description:
Dungeon of Robots is a top-down roguelike dungeon crawler. The goal is to beat as many bosses as you can to go down to the next levels. The only way to heal in the game is to feed your robot friend bolts. You must keep him alive to keep yourself alive.

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Click and point to shoot
  • Right click to give your robot bolts
